titleStmt.title: A sermon of consolation for all true Christians; as it was lately delivered at London-VVall, / by Mr Till, a faithfull minister of Jesus Christ, who though he be deprived of his outward bodily sight, yet is indued with inward spirituall light. Taken from him as it was delivered in short-hand, and now published for the comfort of all true Christians, by J.H. a friend of the authors. It being very usefull for dejected soules in sad times. Licensed, entred, and printed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Till, Mr.
J. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for John Hancock, and to be sold at his shop at the entrance into Popes-head-Alley out of Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
